conclusion: Analyze interaction between car and cubes based on power, collision, and deflection.
Car (A) enters from the lower right corner and moves towards the left.
Car will likely first interact with the red cube, which is closest to its path.
Upon collision, car transfers momentum to red cube, causing it to move and car deflected slightly to the left.
After deflecting off the red cube, car may interact with the green cube next.
Car collides with green cube, causing it to move and car deflected further left.
Car continues to interact with other cubes, being deflected further left each time.
Cubes absorb some of car's momentum, gradually slowing it down.
Car will eventually stop near the center of the arrangement of cubes.
Car stops after interacting with several cubes, transferring momentum and being deflected multiple times.
